participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Emily loves exploring the outdoors and enjoys spending time with animals.
participant_1.background: i have brown curly hair. i'll graduate from high school in two years. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

participant_2.name: Jordan

participant_2.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost.
